data.system_settings: iPhone 6, iOS 11.4 & iPad 2nd generation iOS 9.3.5 - Stable 2.3.0
data.actual_result: Green button stays grey for a while
data.expected_result: The grey button should turn back green
data.short_description: Friend request button stays grey when adding and removing them in profile (Also Visible/beeing seen on iPad)
data.steps_to_repro: - (I used my alt) Go to your alt its profile - Add it as friend - Click the 3 dots in profile  - Click add friend - Let them accept - Remove them
